languages.text: "Признаться — буду рад компании. Мне очень не по себе в этой тюрьме... Однако подъемник не выдержит обе наши группы. Если пойдете вперед — дождитесь нас в карьере, мы спустимся следом".

"I must admit, I do appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, we will follow shortly."
languages.original_text: "Признаться — буду рад компании. Мне очень не по себе в этой тюрьме... Однако подъемник не выдержит обе наши группы. Если пойдете вперед — дождитесь нас в карьере, мы спустимся следом".

traits.locale_text: "I must admit, I appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, and we will follow shortly."

"I must admit, I appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, and we will follow shortly."

"I must admit, I do appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, we will follow shortly."

"I must admit, I do appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, we will follow shortly."

languages.text: «Debo admitir que aprecio su compañía. Esta prisión me produce una intensa sensación de inquietud, pero el ascensor no puede soportar a ambos grupos. Si se adelanta, espere por nosotros en la cantera, le seguiremos en breve».
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I do appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, we will follow shortly."

traits.locale_text: «Debo admitir que aprecio su compañía. Esta prisión me produce una intensa sensación de inquietud, pero el ascensor no puede soportar a ambos grupos. Si se adelanta, espere por nosotros en la cantera, le seguiremos en breve».

languages.text: "Ich muss gestehen, dass mich Eure Gesellschaft erfreut. Dieses Gefängnis bereitet mir starkes Unbehagen. Doch der Aufzug kann nicht unser beider Trupps tragen. Wenn Ihr vorausgeht, wartet im Steinbruch auf uns, wir folgen Euch bald."
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I do appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, we will follow shortly."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss gestehen, dass mich Eure Gesellschaft erfreut. Dieses Gefängnis bereitet mir starkes Unbehagen. Doch der Aufzug kann nicht unser beider Trupps tragen. Wenn Ihr vorausgeht, wartet im Steinbruch auf uns, wir folgen Euch bald."

languages.text: « Je dois avouer que votre compagnie ne me déplaît pas. Cette prison me met particulièrement mal à l'aise. Mais l'ascenseur ne pourra pas abriter nos deux groupes. Si vous prenez les devants, attendez-nous à la carrière, nous vous y retrouverons rapidement. »
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I do appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, we will follow shortly."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois avouer que votre compagnie ne me déplaît pas. Cette prison me met particulièrement mal à l'aise. Mais l'ascenseur ne pourra pas abriter nos deux groupes. Si vous prenez les devants, attendez-nous à la carrière, nous vous y retrouverons rapidement. »

languages.text: “我得承认，我很感激您愿意与我同行，因为这座监狱让我感觉相当不安。不过，电梯没办法同时承载我们两人。或许您可以先行一步去采石场，我们会稍后赶上。”
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I do appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, we will follow shortly."

traits.locale_text: “我得承认，我很感激您愿意与我同行，因为这座监狱让我感觉相当不安。不过，电梯没办法同时承载我们两人。或许您可以先行一步去采石场，我们会稍后赶上。”

languages.text: 「正直に言うと、一緒に来てくれるのはありがたい。この刑務所は俺に強い不安感を与えるのでね。だが、リフトには我々が同時に乗ることはできない。先に行くのであれば、採石場で待っていてくれ。すぐに後を追う」
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I do appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, we will follow shortly."

traits.locale_text: 「認めざるをえない。一緒に行動してくれるのはありがたいよ。この刑務所にいると酷く不安になる。しかし、リフトにはお互いのパーティが同時に乗ることはできない。先に行くときは、採石場で待っていてくれ。すぐに後を追うよ」
「正直に言うと、一緒に来てくれるのはありがたい。この刑務所は俺に強い不安感を与えるのでね。だが、リフトには我々が同時に乗ることはできない。先に行くのであれば、採石場で待っていてくれ。すぐに後を追う」

languages.text: "İtiraf etmeliyim ki eşliğiniz için minnettarım. Bu hapishane bana yoğun bir huzursuzluk hissi veriyor ancak asansör iki grubu da taşıyamaz. Önden gidecekseniz bizi ocakta bekleyin, çok geçmeden geliriz."
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I do appreciate your company. This prison is giving me a strong sense of unease. But the lift cannot support both our parties. If you are going ahead, wait for us in the quarry, we will follow shortly."

traits.locale_text: "İtiraf etmeliyim ki eşliğiniz için minnettarım. Bu hapishane bana yoğun bir huzursuzluk hissi veriyor ancak asansör iki grubu da taşıyamaz. Önden gidecekseniz bizi ocakta bekleyin, çok geçmeden geliriz."
